name: Mirchi 1024
description: Mirchi is one of the fastest growing Bollywood contemporary radio stations in the UAE, boasting of award-winning RJs, engaging content and an incredible audience reach. With an impeccable thirst to stay different, Mirchi 1024 FM continues to entertain its listeners both in the UAE, Middle East and internationally via www.mirchi.ae Tune in to the ultimate Bollywood station, because with us it's all about what you like hearing first and we know just how to keep it hot!

name: Al Arabiya 99
description: The No. 1 Arabic music station in the UAE, reaching 956,000 listeners every week. Al Arabiya 99 appeals to the mass UAE Arab listeners, by playing the most popular songs from across the region and attracts both males & females from various Arab nationalities, including UAE locals.

name: Virgin Radio
description: Virgin Radio Dubai 104.4 FM is the UAE’s №1 Hit Music Station and home to the award-winning Kris Fade Show. Broadcasting the freshest and biggest variety of hit music 24/7 – Virgin Radio 104.4 is undoubtedly the people’s choice in the UAE.

name: City 1016
description: City 1016 is UAE's No.1 Bollywood Radio Station. The Official City 1016 for all the inside scoop from the UAE's No.1 Bollywood Radio Station. Tune in every day to catch Malavika, Lokesh, Sid, Tia Singh, Meghana, Karishma and Tarun.

name: Radio Shoma
description:
رادیو شما موج 93.4 اف ام 
ریتم قلب های شما 
با داغترین و محبوبترین ترانه های جدید روز و خاطره انگیز
تنها رادیوی فارسی زبان در دبی - امارات متحده عربی 
با بهترین آهنگ های روز و خاطره ساز -
آغاز روز با صبح شما با حنان و مجتبی از ساعت 6 تا 10 صبح - روزهای هفته از یکشنبه تا پنجشنبه 
شارژ انرژی با بزن بریم با رکسانا چگینی از ساعت 5 تا 8 شب - یکشنبه تا پنجشنبه 
موسیقی و من با رضا نادری - شنبه ها عصر از 5 تا 8 
آی شما با سامی - جمعه ها شب از ساعت 8 تا 10

name: Radio 4 FM
description: Radio 4 FM 89.1 is a broadcast radio station from Ajman, United Arab Emirates, providing Hit music 24/7 across the Emirates! Keeping you entertained always and providing you with the hottest music and content from Bollywood.

name: For Kids Bathtime Fun
description: The best bathtime songs, just For Kids.

name: Exclusively Chart
description: Today’s biggest hits non stop.

name: Sky News Arabia
description: تقدم قناة سكاي نيوز عربية الأخبار باللغة العربية على مدار الساعة وبشكل فوري بتقنية الوضوح العالي HD. وتهدف القناة إلى تقديم الأخبار بشكل حيوي وسريع وموضوعي إلى منطقة الشرق الأوسط وشمال أفريقيا من خلال 10 مكاتب إخبارية في منطقة الشرق الأوسط وآسيا إضافة إلى مكاتبها في لندن والعاصمة الأمريكية واشنطن. وتستفيد قناة سكاي نيوز عربية من مصادر الأخبار والمكاتب الدولية التابعة لها حول العالم لتقديم التغطية الإعلامية للأحداث الدولية.

name: Quran Kareem 88.2
description: انطلقت إذاعة القرآن الكريم في عام 1979، وكانت في بداياتها تبث القرآن الكريم المرتل فقط، ثم تطورت سنة بعد سنة لتبث العديد من البرامج المتنوعة حيث تجد فيها الترتيل، التفسير، الفتاوى، برامج الأطفال والمرأة وذوي الاحتياجات الخاصة، الحياة الأسرية وغيرها من المواضيع التي تهم المستمع المسلم في مختلف شؤونه وعباداته إضافة إلى المسابقات القرآنية .

name: Radio Nursery
description: Listen, Learn and Grow..... Together.Welcome to RadioNursery.com - It's 24 hours of the best tunes for Kids, Moms and Dads to sing along and the definitive online parental resource!

name: Hit 96.7
description: The No. 1 Malayalam station in the UAE, reaching 363,000 listeners every week. Hit 96.7 caters to the expat Keralites, who make up the largest expat community in the UAE. The station is the only 24-hour Malayalam station in Dubai playing non-stop Malayalam hits and hourly Tamil songs.

name: Gold FM 1013
description: Gold 101.3 FM - Music, Fun, Entertainment, Updates and more! The leading Malayalam FM radio station here in the Dubai, UAE.

name: Radio1UAE
description: Radio 1 : Part of the Gulf News Broadcasting Network.Number 1 for Hit Music.Radio 1 100.5 Abudhabi is a broadcast radio station from Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates, providing Hits, Top 40/Pop, Rock music.

name: 106.2 Big FM
description:
BIG 106.2, a part of FunAsia Network, is a South Asian radio station promising magical music all day long.
At the studios of BIG 106.2, we use the magic of radio to entertain our listeners and also positively influence their lives and spread happiness.

description:
The home of more music more variety, Dubai 92 breakfast with Harry & Pricey and The 92 Feelgood Weekend across the UAE

name: Positively Meditation
description: Facilitating stress relieving meditation and Chakra balancing through brainwave entrainment using binaural tones in the Alpha range of 7hz to 13hz mixed with relaxing music and natural sounds. To achieve maximum benefit you should wear headphones to listen as it is the combination of what is heard in both ears that provides the binaural tone effect.

name: Club FM
description:
Club FM, Kerala’s most loved station, is now in Dubai bringing you just what you’ve been missing. Keeping the fun intact, we promise to take you down memory lane, and transport you back home where your piping hot kaapi awaits you!

description: يسعى "راديو سوا " إلى التواصل الفعال مع الشباب العربي في منطقة الشرق الأوسط عن طريق تزويدهم بآخر الأخبار والمعلومات والموادّ الترفيهية التي تُبث عبر محطات FM والموجات المتوسطة المنتشرة في جميع أرجاء المنطقة.

name: Europa Plus (UAE)
description: Europa Plus UAE 96.3 is a broadcast radio station from Dubai, UAE providing music and program in Russian.

name: Al Khaleejiya
description: No. 1 Khaleeji* station in the UAE, reaching 595,000 listeners every week. Al Khaleejiya 100.9 is the UAE’s local radio station broadcasting only Khaleeji music. With unique songs and intelligent content, the station targets an elite audience of UAE and GCC nationals.

name: Sharjah Radio
description: Sharjah Radio was officially launched in 1972. It was then called ‘The UAE Radio of Sharjah’. In 2015, the station celebrated its 45th anniversary with a new brand identity under the name ‘Sharjah Radio’. Since its inception, Sharjah Radio has firmly established its status as an outstanding media platform providing contemporary news and current affairs.

name: Tag 91.1
description: Tag 91.1 - The First Filipino Radio Station in the UAE. Part of the Arabian Radio Network, reaching 600,000 Filipinos in UAE.

description: الحساب الرسمي لإذاعة القرآن الكريم من الشارقة على تردد 102.7FM

description:
Dubai's only news, talk and sport radio station. Stay one step ahead

name: Zayed Radio For Qura'an
description: Listen online to Zayed Radio For Qura'an 97.6 in Fujairah, United Arab Emirates.

name: Emarat FM
description:
تعدّ "أبوظبي للإعلام"، التي تأسّست في العام 2007، إحدى أسرع المؤسسات الإعلامية والترفيهية نمواً في منطقة الشرق الأوسط. حيث تمتلك وتشغل 25 علامة تجارية في قطاعات التلفزيون والراديو والنشر والإعلام الرقمي.
وتقدم "أبوظبي للإعلام" عبر منصاتها الإعلامية المتنوعة، محتوىً تفاعلياً متنوعاً يخاطب مختلف شرائح جمهورها المحلي والعربي، إضافة إلى تبنيها مبادرات إعلامية واجتماعية، تؤكد رسالتها الإعلامية، وتعزز توجهاتها المعرفية ومساهمتها في خطط التنمية الشاملة. 
لمزيد من المعلومات يرجى زيارة الموقع:www.admedia.ae

name: Radio AYK
description: Radio AYK is an Armenian Online station streaming daily.  Ռատիո ԱՅԳ առցանց կայանը կը սփռուի ամէն օր (24 ժամ / 7 օր) : Դուք կը լսէք  հայկական երաժշտութիւն եւ զանազան հաղորդումներ՝ հոգեւոր, ազգային, մշակութային եւ թարմացուող քաղաքական լուրեր: Մենք կը ջանանք բարձր  պահել ազգն ու մշակոյթը : www.radioayk. com

name: Al Rabia FM
description: Radio Al Rabea FM 107.8 is a broadcast radio station from Ajman, UAE, providing Arabic songs and Information.

name: Radioasia 94.7
description: Radio Asia 94.7 FM, a part of Radio Asia Network, is the first Malayalam radio station in the Gulf. Broadcast from the UAE, Radio Asia has come a long way since it first aired in 1992, and is today the most preferred Malayalam FM station in the region with an extensive and dedicated listener base that spans Qatar, Oman, Kuwait, Bahrain and Saudi Arabia, besides the UAE. Known for its innovative and differentiated programming, Radio Asia has been engaging and entertaining the regional Malayalee community for several years now with its unique blend of news, views and music. Always in step with the times, Radio Asia offers its audience an unparalleled listening choice, with a wide variety of popular programs ranging from talk shows, current affairs discussions and regular news bulletins to serials, musical reality shows and game shows.

name: Radio Russian Dubai
description: Радио Русский Дубай - онлайн-радиостанция, которая вещает для русскоязычной аудитории, проживающей на территории ОАЭ. Современная музыка с дополнением неустаревающих хитов формата RNB-POP всегда порадует слушателя. Также в нашей компании всегда найдутся интересные рубрики и розыгрыши. В новом формате вещания Радио Русский Дубай можно слушать в любом месте и в любое время! Устанавливай мобильное приложение на свой гаджет и слушай нас 24/7. Отличное радио для отличных людей! Включай и качай!

name: Pravasi Bharathi
description: Pravasi Bharathi 810 AM has their own corporate studio in Dubai and the radio is broadcasting from the area for a long time. It is destined to please listeners by creating good quality Malayalam music and other various kinds of likable music shows for their desired number of listeners with very little to no advertisement.

name: Ananaz Radio
description: Cosmopolitan All genres Music stream serving the hospitality Industry from Dubai to the World !Ananaz Radio is a web based internet radio station from Dubai that plays Cosmopolitan All genres of music. Ananaz Radio Plus vote for your hit hit @ http://www.ananaz.com/ananaz-radio-plus/ and get it to the Top of Ananaz Radio Weekly Chart !

description: البث المباشر للعربية FM

name: صوت الإسلام
description:
صوت الإسلام هو راديو أشتهر بسبب بثه البرامج الإسلامية العشوائية و تلاوات القران الكريم بدون أعلانات هذا الراديو يبث عبر الانترنت و الباقات و الأجهزة ألعالمية و أجهزة الدي في بي تي العالمية
الهدف من هذا الراديو نشر ديانة الإسلام و توعية المجتمع به شعارنا هو (كُن داعياً لِلخَيرِ).

name: Easy Instrumentals
description: The smoothest instrumentals from Easy Listening's biggest stars. Free and Easy.

name: Pulse 95 Radio
description: Pulse 95 Radio will keep you updated on all Sharjah news, events and trends. It will also keep you company during your drive! Listen now to Pulse 95 Radio!

name: Kadak FM
description: Kadak FM is a Hindi Radio Station owned by Abu Dhabi Media reaching out to the South Asian community in the UAE. Kadak FM Provides audience with UAE centric content with the best of Bollywood - including music, celebrity interviews and lots more. Catch Kadak FM on 97.3FM (Abu Dhabi), 88.8FM (Dubai) and 95.6 FM (Al Ain).

name: Radio9 - Telugu
description: Radio9 is a non-profit online Radio station. Radio9.fm is considered a bridge connecting widely scattered Telugu NRI community throughout the world to their motherland with more focus on NRI's living in UAE. Radio9.fm with its independent editorial team and support of in-house technical team is successfully conserving and propagating Telugu language, our traditions, culture among the Indian and NRI future generations.

name: Радио «Русские Эмираты»
description:
Радио, музыка, новости, стиль, жизнь, море, жара, Объединенные Арабские Эмираты!
Более 20 лет преданные читатели знали «Русские Эмираты» как мега-популярный интернет-проект и печатный глянцевый журнал. Но мир изменился и пришло время выйти в эфир – теперь голос «Русских Эмиратов» слышен во всех уголках земного шара. «Русские Эмираты» – это русское радио в Дубае (ОАЭ)!

name: Bafa Radio
description: The passion to uphold the love of God to the nations through music was instrumental in the launch of BAFA – Bring a Friend Along to the Cross in the year 2012. Team BAFA aims to proclaim Gods love through music, which stands fulfilled through its live online radio station BAFA RADIO. We are now tuned in by more than 180 nations far and wide and is one of the Worlds’s best Christian radio stations. With its tranquil access to listen to Christian music, the melody room is filled with great collection of your contemporary and traditional favorites. We are BAFA RADIO ,My Life ..My Music , Streaming New and Traditional Hits 24×7.

name: RAK Rock Radio
description:
RAK Rock Radio is a 24/7 streaming radio service and the only dedicated rock channel based out of Ras Al Khaimah in the U.A.E. We are changing the way you listen to radio with our variety of rock genres which are all creatively blended together.
	Show more

description:
Playing the very best house music from all genres - 24/7.
4 The Music was created by, and is run by, DJs with years of experience in some of the best clubs around the World.

name: VVIP FM
description: Dubai #1 Source for Music, Videos, Performances & More.VVIP.FM is an online Radio channel based in Dubai, which broadcasts internationally . It includes its own in house audio production and online broadcasting arm based in Kilma Creative Studios. Being based in the middle east region Arabian artist will feature heavily on the station.

name: Dubai Dragon
description: Playing the biggest hits from China, Dubai Dragon is the UAE’s first and only dedicated Chinese radio station. Broadcasting 24 hours a day in Mandarin, the station is a bridge between Chinese and Emirati culture, informing listeners of what’s on around the country and educating them on the rich cultural history of the UAE. The station is home to the Asia Pop 40, counting down the biggest hit music every week only on the Dubai Dragon.

name: FRED FILM RADIO
description: FRED Film Radio - the only multi lingual online radio station that brings you the insight on film festivals and film events all around the world!

description: The Groove Society streams the world's most addictive edm music. Our station feature more than 150 weekly shows with world renowned artists, DJs, Be Part of Dubai Dance Revolution

name: Josh FM 97.7
description: Welcome to Josh 97.8, Radio with real personality. Get ready to feel the difference, the power and the energy of this dynamic new listening experience.Josh has proudly teamed up with the Oscar - Winning music maestro A.R.Rahman - to give us an audio identity as distinctive as the station. The content too is the best. Add in the biggest hits from 2006 until today and its easy to see why Josh 97.8 is what the young, ambitious and fun loving south asian expats like YOU have been waiting for!

description: НАШИ ЭМИРАТЫ - единственная русскоязычная радиостанция в ОАЭ. Наша студия находится в Дубае. 24/7 в нашем эфире звучат главные отечественные хиты и горячие новинки. Новости ОАЭ, развлекательные шоу, юмор, конкурсы, подарки и общение. Утреннее "WAKE UP SHOW" с 8:00 до 12:00 (дубайское время). Вечернее шоу "ЕЩЕ НЕ ВЕЧЕР" с 15:00 до 19:00 (дубайское время).

description: Join us for some of the biggest gigs that didn’t happen but should have. You’ll love our triple bill superstars with our selection of fantasy gigs.
